summary: This document is a certification of business records from FedEx Express, signed by a Senior Paralegal Specialist and Custodian of Records. It authenticates FedEx records for use in litigation, likely related to the Epstein case, and includes a notary seal from Tennessee.

persons.name: Senior Paralegal Specialist and Custodian of Records
persons.role: Senior Paralegal Specialist and Custodian of Records at FedEx Express Legal Department
persons.context: The individual certifies the authenticity of FedEx business records for litigation purposes, declaring the records were made at or near the time of the events, kept in regular business activity, and made as a regular practice.

events.title: Certification of FedEx Business Records
events.description: A Senior Paralegal Specialist and Custodian of Records at FedEx Express certifies under penalty of perjury that certain business records are original or true copies, made near the time of the events, kept in regular business activity, and made as regular practice.
personsInvolved: Senior Paralegal Specialist and Custodian of Records

locations: 3620 Hacks Cross Road Building B, Third Floor, Memphis, TN 38125
keyFacts: This document is a certification of business records from FedEx Express, likely subpoenaed for litigation related to the Epstein case.
The records are certified as original or true copies made at or near the time of the events, kept in regular business activity, and made as a regular practice.
The certification is signed under penalty of perjury by a Senior Paralegal Specialist and Custodian of Records at FedEx Express Legal Department.
The document includes a notary seal from the State of Tennessee, with a commission expiration date in 2015.
